titles.title: Volunteer Firefighter and Emergency Medical Service Incentive Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a $2,000 refundable credit for individuals who are active members of volunteer firefighting and emergency medical service organizations.
Volunteer Firefighter and Emergency Medical Service Incentive Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Volunteer Firefighter and Emergency Medical Service Incentive Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $2,000 refundable tax credit for active members of a qualified volunteer fire department (an organization providing firefighting or emergency medical services).
